subject: Football (College)
Mental Health and Disorders
Homeless Persons
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Ryan Hoffman, once a standout lineman for North Carolina who slipped into a life of mental illness and homelessness, left behind many questions for those who knew him.
snippet: Ryan Hoffman, once a standout lineman for North Carolina who slipped into a life of mental illness and homelessness, left behind many questions for those who knew him.
